derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent. (in the sense 'not separate or distinguishable'; originally as indiscreet): from Latin indiscretus, from in- 'not' + discretus 'separate' (see discreet). Compare with indiscreet

means.word_mean: 1. not divided or divisible into parts;
